title: Network of ecological interactions
description: Contains a list of interactions, along with general informations on sampling methodology

id.description: Access code for the network in the local database

metaweb.description: True if the network is a metaweb

interactions.description: A list of access codes for interactions constituting this network

date.description: Time at which the network was sampled

location.description: The location as in lat/lon of the network

environment.description: Access keys for the sets of environmental conditions
